features.title: THE POWER OF IDEs
features.description: Integrated Development Environment is a professional platform for developers to write code. An IDE is made up of multiple state of the art components which are fully integrated in the software. These components help the developer to write code efficiently, provide deep performance analysis, help in debugging your code to find errors and solutions, and do much more.

features.title: BUILDING BLOCKS
features.description: Frameworks are a collection of libraries and packages that are used to develop native or cross-platform applications of various kinds. With frameworks, you can make video games, web, mobile, and desktop applications, microservices, ethical hacking and much more. They are the foundation on which developers can build professional and enterprise-level applications.

features.title: CODING LANGUAGES
features.description: A coding language is an artificial language that can be used to control the behavior of a machine, particularly a computer. Coding languages are defined through the use of syntactic and semantic rules, to determine structure and meaning respectively. Using popular frameworks and libraries, that use the language, one can develop various applications and tools.

comments.name: Austin Wade
comments.description: I am a full-stack developer working in Microsoft. Over the last few years, I have used multiple IDE's and Codexo has been my biggest source of information from the beginning.

comments.name: Michael Olav
comments.description: I am a game developer working in Unity. Codexo provided me with all the necessary information to start my game development journey. Now, I have successfully learnt C# and Unity.

comments.name: Kathy James
comments.description: I am a mobile app developer at Google. I use Flutter and Dart to develop cross-platform mobile apps. Codexo is widely used by junior developers.

comments.name: Luis Gomez
comments.description: Before getting into Oracle, I learnt about Java and JSpring through Codexo. This website has helped me a lot in understanding what I need to learn.

comments.name: Jason Borne
comments.description: Being a Data Scientist at IBM, I need to use new languages to integrate our projects into multiple platforms. Codexo has helped me a lot in understanding new languages and tools.

comments.name: Victor Chavez
comments.description: Being new in the industry, I wanted to learn new technologies and languages. Codexo provided me with all the knowledge I needed to learn these new frameworks, libraries, packages, and more.
